name: Cubet Technologies
overview:
Cubet Technologies is a young and vibrant software firm located in Kerala, ‘the God’s Own Country’, India. Within a short span of our operations we have proven to be a team of highly competent technocrats passionate about providing the best customer support. Our clientele is spread across the globe and we believe in customer delight and going the extra mile to make their business a success. We understand our clients’ business requirements and collaborate with them to deliver customized solutions to suit their business strategies. This provides them with the necessary competitive advantage making them winners in their own arena.

Our team comprises of the right mix of technocrats and management experts with exposure in all areas of business. The vast domain knowledge and expertise in state-of-the-art technologies are our core competencies. Our dynamic team works as our customer’s business partners, providing round the clock support which nullifies the concerns in outsourcing as your solutions are safe with us.
